# Mapgen

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Mapgen is an R package that perform gene mapping using functionally-informed genetic fine mapping.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Mapgen from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kevinlkx/Mapgen")
```

After installing, check that it loads properly:
``` r
library(Mapgen)
```
